cab.content: BATTLE SITUATION * EVENING - 1st APRIL, 1918* ^0RTH OF THE- SOjggS* There has been no change in thesituation.2. SOUTH OF THE SOMMB, There has been hard fighting inthe neighbourhood of MORETJIL. Between MOREUIL and HANSARD,British Cavalry, in a brilliant counter-attack, retook aWood which had been lost previously.5. FRENCH FRONT, An enemy attack was beaten off Southof MOREUIL, otherwise the day has been comparatively quiet.General Staff,War Office,1st April, 1918.Issued at 8*5 p*m*-mmm
